item.title: An African Attila: Tales of the Zulu Reign of terror
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book An African Attila: Tales of the Zulu reign of terror, by P. A Stuart. Shuter & Shooter, publishers and booksellers, Pietermaritzburg, 1938. First published in 1927, second, Illustrated Edition 1938 Copyright. Printed in England by Simson Shand Ltd., London and Hertford.]
